data.title: Bamenda Archbishop Emeritus Fr. Paul Verdzekov is dead
data.meta_description: Christians of Bamenda Archdiocese are in shock after they learnt of the death of Archbishop Emeritus of Bamenda Mgr. Paul Verdzekov on Tuesday, January 26, 2010 at Ntasen, Bamenda. Fr. Paul died quietly in his sleep during siesta at the Catholic Health Centre in Ntasen where he took up residence since he retired in 2005.â€¦
data.text: Writing is an art, however, journalism requires courage to withstand police brutality, intimidation, falsehood, and bias reporting. These are the qualities you need to dig deep and bring the truth to your readers and audience as it happens. This is Freedom Magazine standing up for the oppress people across the world. Freedom Magazine is one of Africa's most independent online news outlets representing wholly the 'the voiceless'. Those oppressed and suppressed and who are afraid or lack the medium to tell their stories. We speak for them by bringing their stories to the world. With a team of fearless, tireless and dedicated men and women, we bring to you uncensored news, events, stories and reports across the world as they happen. Be the first to know by signing up to our newsletter, or join our team of dedicated men and women and become a voice of freedom. You can also publish and advertise with us or become a contributor. Thank you Julius Che (Publisher and Editor-in-Chief of Freedom Magazine, LL.M Laws, MA Social Work, Post Master of Health Policy, Advanced Master of Social Work [CPD], several Diplomas in Good Governance and Human Rights...) View all posts by Freedom Magazine
